name: ActionControl

jsdoctags.comment: The item to perform the action on.
The function to call, if you want to reload the grid.

properties.name: icon
properties.rawdescription: The icon for the action button.

properties.name: iconClasses
properties.description: The icon classes for the action button icon.
properties.rawdescription: The icon classes for the action button icon.

properties.name: priority
properties.description: Defines the order in which action controls appear. Higher value means earlier position. Controls without priority are handled with priority = 0. If you want to place an action after an action without priority, negative numbers can be used.
properties.rawdescription:
Defines the order in which action controls appear. Higher value means earlier position.
Controls without priority are handled with priority = 0. If you want to place an action after
an action without priority, negative numbers can be used.

properties.name: showIf
properties.description: Determines if the action should be shown for given item (if not defined, the action will be shown always).
properties.rawdescription: Determines if the action should be shown for given item (if not defined, the action will be shown always).

jsdoctags.comment: The item for which the action is supposed to be performed.

properties.name: showOnHover
properties.description: Action icon will be visible on hover only
properties.rawdescription: Action icon will be visible on hover only

properties.name: text
properties.rawdescription: The label for the action button.

properties.name: type
properties.description: The type of the action, predefined or custom.
properties.rawdescription: The type of the action, predefined or custom.

description: Describes a data grid action control for individual item.
rawdescription: Describes a data grid action control for individual item.
